description:
A terrible storm leads to another run in with the devious Captain Foxy! When Luffy makes the dangerous decision to help his old foe, it could spell disaster for the Straw Hats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hokori Takaki Otoko! Gin Gitsune no Foxy
Un homme et sa fierté ! Foxy le Renard Argenté !
ชายผู้เปี่ยมไปด้วยความทะนง จิ้งจอกเงินฟ็อกซี่
誇り高き男! 銀ギツネのフォクシー
